item.title: SWOT Analysis Guide (With Examples)
item.description: A SWOT analysis is a way to evaluate strengths, weaknesses, opportunities and threats. You might perform this analysis for a product, team, organization, leadership or other entities. SWOT analyses are used in many business environments to gain a better understanding of how to plan for the future. In this article, we discuss what a SWOT analysis is in further detail, why they are used and how to perform a SWOT analysis.
